metaTags.metaDescription: Filter, inspect, and isolate Internet traffic with Cloudflare's Secure Web Gateway (SWG). Block ransomware, phishing, and other malware. Discover how.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Gateway
relatedBlades.subtitle: Zero Trust security for fast, safe Internet browsing —  no backhauling required. Free for up to 50 users. Scalable to 100,000s of users.
relatedBlades.copy:
Threat and data protection on the Internet with Cloudflare

Cloudflare's secure web gateway keeps your data safe from malware, ransomware, phishing, command & control, Shadow IT, and other Internet risks over all ports and protocols. Log every user interaction with rich details.

subMenuItems.linkText: Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE), 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023
IDC MarketScape for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA), 2023
KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE Integration Suites, 2023
Forrester Opportunity Shapshot: Leverage Zero Trust To Combat Multichannel Phishing Threats

features.description: Block ransomware and phishing before they strike, and contain compromised devices before they cause breaches.
Point traffic to Cloudflare from corporate devices, with client support for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android.
Traffic inspection with a policy builder that offers advanced control to filter how data flows.

relatedBlades.title: Block threats on the Internet, known and unknown
relatedBlades.copy:
- Block access to known bad, risky, or unwanted destinations at the DNS or HTTP level with our massive corpus of threat intelligence. 
- Security, content and application-based categories make building policies and auditing security or compliance incidents easy. 
- Not sure whether to allow or block something? Just add Browser Isolation to keep all risks faraway from your endpoints with one click.

relatedBlades.title: Control the flow of data in and out of your organization.
relatedBlades.copy:
- Gain the benefits of data loss prevention (DLP) without the complexity with file type controls that can stop users from uploading files like documents and spreadsheets to unsanctioned apps and sites like social media. 
- Prevent malicious downloads with AV scanning and by blocking users from downloading active types of files like executables and libraries.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a laptop in front of a cloud

relatedBlades.quote: "Algolia is growing pretty fast. We needed a way to have visibility across our corporate network without slowing things down for our employees. Gateway gave us a simple way to do that."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Our whole team is remote, working from home offices. We don't have a server room with hardware firewall appliances, and it wouldn't really make sense to have one. So I'm always looking for ways to keep our team more secure and harden their connections, wherever they are."

"We were an early customer of Cloudflare Gateway. At Storytel we needed an easy way to protect our network and devices from security threats and anomalies. With Gateway, we were able to do just that in less than five minutes."

relatedBlades.title: Faster Internet access
relatedBlades.copy:
- Existing firewall or [secure web gateway](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/access-management/what-is-a-secure-web-gateway/) solutions haul user requests to centralized scrubbing centers for inspections, slowing down user access.
- Cloudflare's edge network operates in %{DataCenterCount} locations around the world, which means it's always close to your users and the resources on the Internet they need. 
- It uses Anycast with a 100% uptime SLA, which means you never have to configure where user-initiated traffic is routed or worry about outages.

relatedBlades.title: SaaS application control
relatedBlades.copy:
- Cloudflare's logging capabilities allow you to discover unsanctioned use of SaaS applications, and easily build a policy to block access to such applications. 
- Integrate users and role-based groups from your identity provider into Cloudflare to limit access to specific subdomains and functions of SaaS applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Teams gateway build for the cloud spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Teams gateway build for the cloud spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Near real-time monitoring of traffic across your organization.
relatedBlades.copy:
- Cloudflare's logs provide visibility into your Internet and web traffic — across all users, devices, and locations. 
- In under five minutes, you can push logs directly into your SIEM or cloud storage platform of choice.

relatedBlades.title: Sign up free for up to 50 users

buttonModal.title: Request a Zero Trust discussion
buttonModal.regularCopy: Fill out the form below, and an expert from our team will get in touch to schedule a customized discussion of your Zero Trust journey and how Cloudflare may be able to help.

relatedBlades.title: Legacy approach
relatedBlades.copy: Teams need to connect to the Internet to do their work. Legacy approaches attempted to force that traffic, which is mostly encrypted, through appliances that could not scale with complex and costly implementations to mitigate hardware failure or software upgrade downtime.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Zero Trust
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare replaces always outdated boxes with one global network. And in one platform, we unite once-distinct point products including Secure Web Gateway (SWG), DNS Security, and Remote Browser Isolation (RBI) with Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) use cases.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Zero Trust - Secure Web Gateway
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Zero Trust - Secure Web Gateway

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Gateway and SASE
relatedBlades.copy: A secure web gateway is an important component of the Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) network security model. Learn how Cloudflare Gateway integrates seamlessly with the other security and connectivity tools in Cloudflare's SASE solution, Cloudflare One.

imageAssetFile.altText: Diagram depicting Cloudflare One offers users secure, authenticated. access wherever they are.
imageAssetFile.title: cf-one

features.title: Solution Brief: Remote work security over the long haul
features.description: Learn how Cloudflare's Zero Trust solution works together to provide secure, optimized connectivity for remote workforces.

features.title: Zero Trust for SaaS Apps
features.description: Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform enables your organization with visibility into and policy controls over SaaS applications. Learn how Cloudflare helps you discover shadow IT, apply Zero Trust access policies, and data protection controls for SaaS apps.
